description: AI text generation for multiple cursors/selections with OpenAI-compatible endpoints, supporting rate limiting, retries, streaming insertion, status bar and logging.
command.generate.title: Multi Cursor AI: Generate
command.syncModels.title: Multi Cursor AI: Sync Models
command.setApiKey.title: Multi Cursor AI: Set API Key
command.clearApiKey.title: Multi Cursor AI: Clear API Key
command.toggleUseStreaming.title: Multi Cursor AI: Toggle Use Streaming
command.setTemperature.title: Multi Cursor AI: Set Temperature
command.setPreSeparator.title: Multi Cursor AI: Set Pre Separator
command.toggleTrimResult.title: Multi Cursor AI: Toggle Trim Result
command.setLogLevel.title: Multi Cursor AI: Set Log Level
command.setReasoningEffort.title: Multi Cursor AI: Set Reasoning Effort
command.toggleDisableReasoning.title: Multi Cursor AI: Toggle Disable Reasoning
command.toggleSingleLineOutput.title: Multi Cursor AI: Toggle Single Line Output
configuration.title: Multi Cursor AI
config.baseUrl.description: Base URL for OpenAI-compatible API, e.g., https://api.openai.com or custom gateway.
config.apiKeySecretId.description: Identifier for storing API Key in SecretStorage.
config.apiKeyEnvVar.description: Environment variable name for reading default API Key.
config.modelList.description: List of available models (shown in QuickPick).
config.requestPath.description: Generation request API path, prefer chat/completions, can be changed to /v1/completions.
config.useStreaming.description: Whether to use SSE streaming mode (endpoint must support text/event-stream).
config.proxy.description: HTTP(S) proxy, e.g., http://127.0.0.1:7890. Empty means no proxy.
config.rejectUnauthorized.description: Whether to reject untrusted TLS certificates (self-signed). Set to false to ignore TLS verification (insecure).
config.maxTokens.description: Maximum token limit for response. Set to 0 for no limit (server decides).
config.requestBodyMode.description: Request body mapping mode: auto-select chat/completions, or force a specific mode.
config.httpMaxConnections.description: Maximum HTTP connection pool size (recommended to align with max concurrency).
config.maxRequestsPerMinute.description: Maximum requests per minute (token bucket rate).
config.dynamicLimitProbe.description: Dynamic rate limit probing: adjust in real-time based on rate limit response headers and 429/503.
config.maxRetries.description: Maximum retry attempts after failure (with backoff).
config.maxBackoffMs.description: Maximum milliseconds cap for exponential backoff.
config.insertMode.description: Insert mode: append to end or replace selection.
config.trimResult.description: Whether to trim leading/trailing whitespace from returned text.
config.promptTemplate.description: Prompt template, must contain at least {userPrompt} and {selection} placeholders.
config.systemPromptEnabled.description: Whether to send system prompt (system message).
config.globalPrependInstruction.descript: Global instruction to prepend before final user prompt, for constraining style or format.
config.promptHistoryLimit.description: Maximum prompt history entries (for QuickPick history list).
config.reasoningEffort.description:
Cerebras Reasoning model reasoning intensity (for gpt-oss-120b).

- `none`: No reasoning
- `low`: Minimal reasoning, faster response
- `medium`: Medium reasoning (default level)
- `high`: Deep reasoning, more comprehensive analysis
config.disableReasoning.description: Whether to disable Cerebras Reasoning (for zai-glm-4.6 model). Set to `false` to enable reasoning, `true` to disable.
config.singleLineOutput.description: Whether to force AI output to single line (replace line breaks with \\n characters).
